Title: Stick Love
Description:
Stick Love,based on ASP.NET, Ajax,Silverlight technology and Azure Services Platform, helps you to express your mind with simple stick drawings.
You can simply share your masterpiece with  friends by a url address.
What's more,Playback feature is supported!
http://y.cloudapp.net
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Stick Love,based on ASP.NET, Ajax,Silverlight technology and Azure Services Platform, helps you to express your mind with simple stick drawings.
You can simply share your masterpiece with friends by a url address.
What's more,Playback feature is supported!
http://y.cloudapp.net


Stick Love is a cloud based software - also sometimes called software as a service.

We use following technologies:
  • ASP.NET 3.5
  • ASP.NET AJAX
  • LINQ
  • Silverlight 2.0
  • Windows Azure
  • SQL Data Services

You can play with it right now! http://Y.cloudapp.net
Some demos here: (demos may help you to get a quick view of our Stick Love project.)
  • http://y.cloudapp.net/v.aspx?d=3882205000000
  • http://y.cloudapp.net/v.aspx?d=3275062198262
